title: Congress defers foreign policy to president

content.question: In general, Congress is most likely to defer to the President

choices.label: in the area of foreign policy
in the area of fiscal policy
in the area of social policy

content.answer: in the area of foreign policy

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
